name: Uncorrupt
description:
Uncorrupt is a Shoot Em Up / Adventure Game, here you will control Neil an Industrial Engineer that lives in an apocalyptic world, corrupted by a parasite called Darkmass.

Neil's daughter, Sally, has been infected  by the Darkmass, Neil and Frank (his pharmacist friend) have discovered that Arcboglia's river contain healing compounds, but it only worked with animals not with humans.

Neil decided to go across Arcboglia, the most affected place by the Darkmass to find the cure and safe Sally's life.
